title: Mark Hughes: The post-Horner change behind Red Bull's F1 revival
summary: Max Verstappen's push for a more driver-led set-up has reshaped Red Bull's approach and sparked a return to winning form, as seen in the 2025 Azerbaijan Grand Prix

qa_pairs.question: What role did Max Verstappen play in reshaping Red Bull's approach in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: He advocated for a more driver-led set-up.
wrong_options: He requested a change in team management.
He pushed for a different engine supplier.
He demanded a new chassis design.

qa_pairs.question: In which race did Red Bull demonstrate a return to winning form in 2025?
What significant change occurred at Red Bull that contributed to their revival in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A shift towards a more driver-focused team strategy.
wrong_options: A complete overhaul of the engineering team.
The introduction of a new car model.
